listitem.para: [renodr] - Use the correct systemd unit in Gutenprint.
[renodr] - Stop modifying the systemd unit for cups-browsed now that we're using OpenPrinting CUPS.
[ken] - Add patch to enable building gst-plugins-good against Qt5 or some other dependencies.
[renodr] - Use the correct unit name for CUPS.
[renodr] - Disable valgrind in libdrm to allow sysprof to build properly.
[thomas] - Add an optional patch to hexchat adding the libera.chat network.
[bdubbs] - Update to sassc-3.6.2 and libsass-3.6.5. Fixes #15070.
[renodr] - Remove unnecessary configure switches from the xf86-input-wacom driver.
[renodr] - Remove instructions for moving the dbus shared library to /lib.
[renodr] - Update the default path in shadow to be consistent with LFS.
[renodr] - Force libxcb to use python3, even if python2 is present on the system.
[renodr] - Adapt some scripts in subversion to python3.
[renodr] - Remove unnecessary instructions from hdparm due to the merged-/usr transition.
[thomas] - Use OpenPrinting CUPS. Thanks to Marty Jack for the pointer.
[pierre] - gnome-shell: add a patch to fix a failure to start xwayland applications on non systemd.
[ken] - in Linux-PAM do not move libs to /lib.
[bdubbs] - Update to libX11-1.7.1 (xorg library; Security Release). Fixes #15056.
[ken] - DHCP - remove instruction to move dhclient to /sbin and use /usr/sbin for dhclient-script.
[renodr] - Restore the ICU-69 patch in node.js.
[renodr] - Create symlinks to /usr/sbin instead of /sbin in ntfs-3g (for consistency).
[pierre] - Recommend a build order for the circular dependency between elogind and polkit.
[renodr] - Fix building fuse-3.10.3 with GCC-11.1.0 and also stop moving libraries/binaries to /bin and /lib.
[renodr] - Stop moving /usr/bin/traceroute to /bin in the installation instructions for traceroute.
[renodr] - Remove an unnecessary test adaptation to keyutils now that merged-/usr changes have landed in LFS.
[renodr] - Make changes to the MIT Kerberos V5 page to stop moving libraries and programs to /lib and /bin.
[renodr] - Remove instructions for installing cpio in /bin. In merged-/usr, /usr/bin is fine.
[ken] - Remove instructions from libtirpc for moving libraries to /lib.
[ken] - Remove instructions from libmnl for moving libraries to /lib.
[ken] - Remove instructions from iptables for installing to /sbin and /lib/xtables.
[renodr] - Disable generating documentation on cyrus-sasl until Sphinx and docutils are both fixed.
[renodr] - Remove instructions from PCRE for moving libraries to /lib.
[renodr] - Removed the instructions for moving the popt library in the event that /usr is not available.
[pierre] - Patch firefox so that HTML videos do not crash, if compiled with rust-1.52.0.
[pierre] - Fix the pkgconfig file for lua-5.2: the library was -llua instead of -llua5.2.
[thomas] - Add a patch to make curl compatible with openldap-2.5.4. Fixes #15026.
[ken] - Update to firefox-78.10.1 and js78.10.1. Fixes #14995.
[ken] - Fix seamonkey build breakage with rust-1.52.0.
[ken] - Patch qtwebengine-20210401 for latest fixes (security update). Fixes #14999.
[renodr] - Fix building WebKitGTK+ with ICU-69.1. Patch by Xi Ruoyao.
[renodr] - Fix building Node.JS with ICU-69.1. Patch by Ken Moffat.
[renodr] - Adapt the Dovecot Lua plugin to Lua-5.4. Fixes #14977.
[timtas] - Add a sed to cups-filters to allow building with openldap 2.5.4. Fixes #14978.
[thomas] - Update to bind-9.16.15 (server and utils). Fixes #14951.
[renodr] - Fix the systemd patch to allow compilation with meson-0.57.2 and with Linux-API-Headers-5.11.14 and higher.
[renodr] - Fix the build of dvisvgm by putting the Python sed after autoreconf -fiv.
[ken] - Patch xindy to include upstream changes.
[xry111] - Add workaround for cracklib to build Python 3 module.
[xry111] - Revert 7b66ed21, as the proposed fix in it is rejected by Python maintainers.
[ken] - Update to firefox-78.10.0esr (security fixes) and JS-78.10.0.
[pierre] - Fix a build error in evolution-data-server-3.40.0 with cmake-3.20.1.
[renodr] - Fix the MPlayer instructions and apply several minor tweaks to the page. Fixes #14891.
The XML source code of this book is migrated from SVN to Git.
[ken] - Patch inkscape to build with glib-2.68. Fixes #14889.
[ken] - Update to a qtwebengine snapshot from 2021-04-01 (Security Update). Fixes #14863.
[renodr] - Adapt Cheese to changes in vala-0.52. Fixes #14882.
[renodr] - Fix a security vulnerability in avahi. Fixes #14866.
[renodr] - Fix a security vulnerability in NetworkManager. Fixes #14868.
[renodr] - Fix a security vulnerability in p7zip. Fixes #14867.
[pierre] - Remove a spurious file in doxygen that prevents building the documentation.
[ken] - Add a warning in xdg-utils about an unfixed security vulnerability.
[ken] - Patch libssh2-1.9.0 for a security vulnerability. Fixes #14853.
[ken] - Patch flac-1.3.3 for a security vulnerability. Fixes #14852.
[renodr] - Fix Hexchat to work with Python-3.8+ and fix a crash that occurs when Lua-5.4.3 is installed.
[ken] - Patch Python-2.7.18 for security vulnerabilities. Fixes #14843.
[renodr] - Adapted the instructions for backgrounds in Fluxbox to be able to copy themes that are stored in directories.
[renodr] - Fix a syntax error that causes MariaDB to fail to build with CMake-3.20.
[renodr] - Update to lxml-4.6.3 (Python Module). Includes a fix for a security vulnerability. Fixes #14808.
[renodr] - Update the PDFBox/FontBox JARs to 2.0.23 in FOP. Patches against two security vulnerabilities. Fixes #14805.
[renodr] - Modify the qtwebengine patch to fix a build failure when building on a system with libxml2 that was built before ICU was installed.
[xry111] - Add packages and instructions for booting on UEFI based system. Fixes #5379.
[ken] - Update to firefox-78.9.0 and JS-78.9.0 (security fixes). Fixes #14804.
[ken] - Revise the Kernel Configuration section of QtWebEngine: User namespace works if PID namespace is enabled.
[ken] - Update to qtwebengine-5.15.3 from git (security fixes). Fixes #14729.
[pierre] - Patch dconf-editor so that it builds with vala-0.50.4.
[renodr] - Update the gstreamer stack to gst*-1.18.4. Includes updates for five security vulnerabilities. Fixes #14776.
[xry111] - Update to GnuTLS-3.7.1 (with security fixes). Fixes #14750.
[renodr] - Make sure that the instructions for creating a symlink for /usr/lib/systemd in $KF5_PREFIX are still run when reinitializing /opt/kf5.
[ken] - Prevent a (mostly harmless) segfault when a urxvt term (from rxvt-unicode) shuts down.
[ken] - Add a patch to mupdf to fix a security issue. Fixes #14749.
[ken] - Add a caution about unpatched security vulnerabilities in QtWebEngine and Falkon. Addresses #14729.
[renodr] - Update the systemd patch to allow systemd-rfkill to still function properly once LFS gets updated to Linux-5.11.
[renodr] - Update to OpenSSH-8.5p1 (and ssh-askpass-8.5p1). Includes a security fix for ssh-agent. Fixes #14725.
[renodr] - Update to gtksourceview-4.8.1. Includes a patch to prevent a race condition on some systems. Fixes #14724.
[pierre] - Force usage of python3 for cracklib bindings.
[thomas] - Fix a seccomp issue in OpenSSH on non-x86_64 platforms.
